divs: Sighting Detailslooked out of window at planets, I then notice a large orange,glowing object roof top, It then looked like an explosion into silver, it dissappeared. there were several small objects moving for at least l-hr.I was dizzy, and sick for about several hours after this event. I did not sleep at all. I felt threatened.
